html:
Best Price Ever

Apple AirPods Max

Everyone deserves a pair of headphones that are as chic as they are functional. If you prefer an over-ear style, add this highly covetable pair to your cart ASAP—they tend to sell out quickly when they’re on sale. Right now they're only $400, which is their lowest price ever.

Best Price Ever

Apple Watch Series 10 [GPS, 42mm]

Track your steps, check your notifications, and play music right from your wrist. Don’t forget to snag a new watch band to style your wearable for any occasion.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple 2025 MacBook Air (M4) [256 GB]

Get $150 off the brand new MacBook Air. This 13-inch computer weighs just 2.7 pounds and boasts up to 18 hours of battery life, making it easy to tote to and from work, class, your local coffee shop—you name it.

Best Price Ever

Apple iPad Mini (A17 Pro) [128 GB, WiFi]

Don’t let this tablet’s tiny size fool you: This is the perfect device for watching Netflix on the go, devouring your latest literary fiction read, or jotting down notes during flights.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Price Ever

Apple AirPods Pro 2

Apple’s AirPods are worth the hype. Complete with features like Active Noise Cancellation, water-resistance, and silicone ear tips for a customizable fit, they’re bound to become your daily headphones. (Prime Day is the best time of year to score them on sale, but they’re always one of the first things to sell out.)

Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS, 40mm]

Whether you’re new to the world of wearables or need to upgrade an older device, the Apple Watch SE makes it easy to do so without breaking the bank. Although this is the brand’s entry-level model, it likely has most of the health and fitness features you’re looking for.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple 2024 MacBook Pro (M4) [512 GB]

If you’ve been waiting to upgrade your laptop, there’s truly never been a better time: The 2024 MacBook Pro, Apple’s most sophisticated laptop, is more than $150 off. Updated with an ultra-quick M4 processor, this computer boasts enhanced graphics and a speedier performance than past models.

Best Price Ever

Apple iPad (A16) [128 GB, WiFi]

Ahead of Prime Day 2025, the standard iPad is $50 off. Although it’s an entry-level option, it boasts high-tech features like TouchID, all-day battery life (up to 10 hours when surfing the web or watching video), and an impressive 11.2-inch Liquid Retina display.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Price Ever

Apple AirPods 4

Need an earbud upgrade at a wallet-friendly price? Look no further than the AirPods 4, complete with a redesigned shape and 30 hours of battery life. Plus, if you’re not a fan of the gummy ear tips on the AirPods Pro, these offer a similar fit sans those silicone pieces.

Apple 2024 iMac All-in-One Desktop Computer (M4)

Working from home is a whole lot easier with an iMac. Your eyes will appreciate the larger display, and your wallet will be grateful for this early Prime Day discount. Plus, it includes a matching mouse and keyboard.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple AirTag 4-Pack

Lost luggage is a thing of the past with Apple’s ingenious AirTags, which give you peace of mind by tracking the location of your prized possessions. Snag a four-pack so you can stash one in your wallet or on your keychain.

Apple Magic Keyboard Folio

This case turns your iPad into a laptop while also giving your investment some welcome protection. It comes complete with a smooth Apple keyboard and trackpad.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Apple MagSafe Charger (2m)

If you haven't jumped over to team Wireless Charging, now's the time to do so. Not only does this MagSafe charger juice up your phone ultra quickly, but it's longer than your average charging cord. Plus, it's also compatible with your AirPods.
